column4: Is it possible to get a vid from YouTube and paste into OpernOffice?
doubtful
I wanted to find it on Google videos, but athey all seem to be Youtube.
you're trying to take a video and paste it into openoffice?
into the presentation
.odp fiel
file*

google video and youtube stream the content directly off the server
meaning...?

sniffing?  Like on Wireshark?
and, i don't know of a way to embed a video into the presentation
something like that
